hero.subtitle: From Shopify Plus to custom platforms, we create scalable e-commerce solutions that drive sales, enhance customer experience, and grow your business globally.

platforms.title: E-commerce Platforms
platforms.subtitle: Choose the perfect platform for your online store. From enterprise solutions to custom builds, we have expertise across all major e-commerce technologies.

shopify.title: Shopify Plus
shopify.description: Enterprise-grade Shopify solutions with advanced customization, multi-store management, and high-volume capabilities for scaling businesses.

woocommerce.title: WooCommerce
woocommerce.description: Flexible WordPress-based e-commerce with custom plugins, unlimited customization, and complete control over your online store.

medusa.title: Medusa.js
medusa.description: Modern headless commerce platform with microservices architecture, API-first approach, and unlimited customization possibilities.

custom.title: Custom Platforms
custom.description: Bespoke e-commerce solutions built from scratch with unique requirements, advanced integrations, and scalable architecture.

saleor.title: Saleor
saleor.description: Open-source headless commerce platform with GraphQL API, advanced product management, and built-in internationalization.

bigcommerce.title: BigCommerce
bigcommerce.description: Enterprise SaaS platform with built-in features, API-first architecture, and seamless third-party integrations for growing businesses.

payments.title: Payment Solutions
payments.subtitle: Secure, fast, and flexible payment processing with support for all major gateways and emerging payment methods

advanced_features.title: Advanced E-commerce Features
advanced_features.subtitle: Go beyond basic online stores with intelligent inventory management, advanced analytics, marketing automation, and AI-powered personalization features.

inventory.title: Smart Inventory Management
inventory.description: Real-time stock tracking, automated reordering, multi-warehouse management, and predictive analytics to prevent stockouts and overstock situations.

analytics.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics
analytics.description: Deep customer insights, sales performance tracking, conversion optimization, and predictive analytics to drive data-driven decision making.

marketing.title: Marketing Automation & AI
marketing.description: Automated email campaigns, personalized product recommendations, abandoned cart recovery, and AI-powered customer journey optimization.

case_studies.title: Success Case Studies
case_studies.subtitle: Real results from real businesses. See how our e-commerce solutions have transformed companies across industries and driven measurable growth.

techgear.title: TechGear Electronics
techgear.challenge: Mid-sized electronics retailer struggling with inventory management across 3 warehouses, slow checkout process, and limited mobile experience resulting in 68% cart abandonment rate.
techgear.solution: Implemented Shopify Plus with custom inventory management app, optimized mobile checkout flow, integrated advanced analytics, and developed AI-powered product recommendations.

fashion.title: Fashion Forward Boutique
fashion.challenge: Luxury fashion brand needed headless commerce solution to integrate with existing PIM system, support multiple currencies, and provide personalized shopping experiences across 15 countries.
fashion.solution: Built custom headless commerce platform using Medusa.js with microservices architecture, integrated advanced PIM system, implemented multi-currency support, and developed AI-powered style recommendations.

overall.title: Overall Portfolio Performance
overall.subtitle: Cumulative results across all our e-commerce projects in the last 3 years

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your Store?
cta.subtitle: Let's build an e-commerce platform that drives sales, delights customers, and scales with your business. From concept to launch and beyond.
